summary: Spring 1945. The end of World War II is approaching. In Western Belarus, near Grodno, there is a gang headed by a hardcore criminal, a former accomplice of the Germans, Boleslav Kruk. At ... See full summary Â»

title: Pristupit k likvidatsii
